trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods to add a license to a component and to manage a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce proprietà e metodi per aggiungere una licenza a un componente e per gestire un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The LicenseManager class provides the following `static` properties: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.UsageMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La classe LicenseManager offre quanto segue `static` proprietà: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.UsageMode%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.UsageMode%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The class also provides the following `static` methods: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La classe fornisce anche le seguenti `static` metodi: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a component that you want to license, you must do the following: 1.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un componente che si desidera concedere una licenza, è necessario eseguire le operazioni seguenti: 1.

trans-unit.source: Specify the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> by marking the component with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Specificare la <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>contrassegnando il componente con un <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> in the constructor of the component.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>o <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>nel costruttore del componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> throws a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when it tries to create an instance without a valid license.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>Genera un <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>quando tenta di creare un'istanza senza una licenza valida.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException></xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>non genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> on any license that is granted when the component is disposed or finalized.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>per tutte le licenze concesse quando il componente viene eliminato o finalizzato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle licenze, vedere [come: licenza componenti e controlli](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified type, given a context in which you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza del tipo specificato, dato il contesto in cui è possibile utilizzare l'istanza con licenza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> you specify as the `creationContext` parameter is used as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> for the life of this <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>specificare come il `creationContext` parametro viene utilizzato come <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>per la durata di questo <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: The CreateWithContext method blocks all other threads in the <xref:System.AppDomain> from modifying the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>, allowing CreateWithContext to behave as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CreateWithContext impedisce a tutti gli altri thread di <xref:System.AppDomain>di modificare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>, consentendo CreateWithContext si comporti come operazione atomica.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to create.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il tipo da creare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> that specifies when you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> che specifica quando è possibile utilizzare l'istanza con licenza.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza del tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified type with the specified arguments, given a context in which you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza del tipo specificato con gli argomenti specificati, dato il contesto in cui è possibile utilizzare l'istanza con licenza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> you specify as the `creationContext` parameter is used as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> for the life of this <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>specificare come il `creationContext` parametro viene utilizzato come <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>per la durata di questo <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks all other threads in the <xref:System.AppDomain> from modifying the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>, allowing <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A> to behave as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo blocca tutti gli altri thread <xref:System.AppDomain>di modificare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>consentendo <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>si comporti come operazione atomica.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to create.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il tipo da creare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> that specifies when you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> che specifica quando è possibile utilizzare l'istanza con licenza.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Object> that represents the arguments for the type.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta gli argomenti per il tipo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified type with the given array of arguments.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza del tipo specificato con la matrice di argomenti.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref>, which specifies when you can use the licensed object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref>, che specifica quando è possibile utilizzare l'oggetto concesso in licenza.

trans-unit.source: When the user requests a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>, the user must give the context in which the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> is valid to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente richiede un valore valido <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>, l'utente deve fornire il contesto in cui il <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>è valido per il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> returned by this property should be passed to all <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> classes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>restituita da questa proprietà deve essere passato a tutti i <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>classi.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> that specifies when you can use the licensed object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> che specifica quando è possibile utilizzare l'oggetto concesso in licenza.

trans-unit.source: The CurrentContext property is currently locked and cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà CurrentContext attualmente è bloccata e non può essere modificata.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the given type has a valid license.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce se il tipo specificato dispone di una licenza valida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to find a valid license for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>Per trovare for licenza valida.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the given type is licensed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il tipo specificato è concesso in licenza; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a valid license can be granted for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se può essere concessa una licenza valida per il tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: The IsValid method returns `true` when the type is either not licensed, or is licensed and the license is valid.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il metodo IsValid `true` quando il tipo non è autorizzato o è concesso in licenza e la licenza è valida.

trans-unit.source: This method does not throw a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when it cannot grant a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non genera un <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>quando non è possibile concedere un <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> valido</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> method throws exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>metodo genera eccezioni.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il tipo di oggetto che richiede il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a valid license can be granted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è possibile concedere una licenza valida; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a valid license can be granted for the specified instance of the type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se può essere concessa una licenza valida per l'istanza del tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo crea un oggetto valido <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> method returns `true` when the `type` parameter is not licensed, or when it is licensed and the `license` parameter is valid.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>restituisce `true` quando il `type` parametro non è concesso in licenza o se dispone di licenza e `license` parametro è valido.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method does not throw a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when it cannot grant a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non genera un <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>quando non è possibile concedere un <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> valido</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> method throws exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>metodo genera eccezioni.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `license` parameter is not `null` after this call, the object asking for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> must dispose of the license by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> method when the object is disposed of or finalized.
trans-unit.target: Se il `license` parametro non è `null` dopo questa chiamata, l'oggetto che richiede un <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>deve eliminare la licenza chiamando il <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>metodo quando l'oggetto viene eliminato o finalizzato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the license.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il tipo di oggetto che richiede la licenza.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An object of the specified type or a type derived from the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto del tipo specificato o un tipo derivato dal tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> that is a valid license, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a valid license cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> che rappresenta una licenza valida o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se non è possibile concedere una licenza valida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> can be granted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se un oggetto valido <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> può essere concesso; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Prevents changes being made to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> of the given object.
trans-unit.target: Impedisce le modifiche apportate all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> dell'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> to get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> of an object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>per ottenere il <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>di un oggetto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: This method locks the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, preventing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> from being retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo blocca il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, impedendo il <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>vengano recuperate.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: The object whose current context you want to lock.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto il cui contesto corrente si desidera bloccare.

trans-unit.source: The context is already locked.
trans-unit.target: Il contesto è già bloccato.

trans-unit.source: Allows changes to be made to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> of the given object.
trans-unit.target: Consente di apportare modifiche da apportare ai corrente <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> dell'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> to get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> of an object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>per ottenere il <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>di un oggetto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: This method unlocks the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, allowing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente di sbloccare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, consentendo di <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>da recuperare.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: The object whose current context you want to unlock.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto il cui contesto corrente si desidera sbloccare.

trans-unit.source: contextUser represents a different user than the one specified in a previous call to .
trans-unit.target: contextUserrappresenta un utente diverso da quello specificato in una chiamata precedente a .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"></xref> which specifies when you can use the licensed object for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"> </xref> che specifica quando è possibile utilizzare l'oggetto concesso in licenza per <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>

trans-unit.source: If this property cannot find a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> value, it returns <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode>.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà non è stato trovato un <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>valore, viene restituito <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"></xref> values, as specified in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*> property.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"> </xref> valori, come specificato nella <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>proprietà.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a license can be granted for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se può essere concessa una licenza per il tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method throws a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo genera un <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>quando un oggetto valido <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>non può essere concessa.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>metodo non genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the license.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il tipo di oggetto che richiede la licenza.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> non può essere concessa.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a license can be granted for the instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se può essere concessa una licenza per l'istanza del tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method throws a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo genera un <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>quando un oggetto valido <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>non può essere concessa.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>metodo non genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: All objects asking for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> must dispose of the license by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> method when the object is disposed of or finalized.
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli oggetti che richiede un <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>deve eliminare la licenza chiamando il <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>metodo quando l'oggetto viene eliminato o finalizzato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the license.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il tipo di oggetto che richiede la licenza.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> of the specified type or a type derived from the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>del tipo specificato o un tipo derivato dal tipo specificato.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type is licensed, but a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo è concesso in licenza, ma un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> non può essere concessa.
